entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishAOT property causes build failure when used with earlier TFMS in `TargetFrameworks` property #30814
    8.0.1xx
  • Missing PackageDefinitions metadata after 7.0.200 update #30809
  • GenAPI: Filter out generic base class, generic interface if type parameter/s are filtered out. #30805
  • [blazor] dotnet..js file name is missing version info #30802
    7.0.3xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [Servicing] Fix Property Parsing in `publish` and `pack` #30826
  • [Breaking Backport] Fix Encoding On Non EN Languages #30823
  • Download ILCompiler target pack when cross-compiling #30818
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30810
  • Fix passing --interactive flag to nuget #30806
  • GenAPI: improve error handling, extend test coverage. #30803
    Area-GenAPI
  • Produce reference assembly when target is .NET Standard #30792

Merged

  • Fix GenAPI invocation with IncludeAssemblyAttributes #30779
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.9.2 to 19.10.0 in /eng/dependabot #30746
    dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Updated

  • fix issue 30369 enable docker build platform switch #30762
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow multiple loggers for VSTest command #30686
    Area-DotNet Test, DO NOT MERGE
  • 24004: Add --configfile switch to dotnet list package #30615
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Issue 25536 enable -disable-build-servers for pack, clean, test, msbuild #30481
    Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2121313 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Investigate https://github.com/dotnet/templating/issues/5921 #30732
